replies.body:
Regedit basically makes your hits register faster. Latency in Minecraft is the delay on your hits, so it increases your reach and makes you take little kb and the kb you take is straight up. 

For anyone looking for specifics.
replies.body_tagged:

For anyone looking for specifics.

replies.body:
lol, you send packets over to whatever you are using (ex: avicus servers), the farther you are the longer it takes, hence bigger ms.
When your cpu sends packets faster it goes through faster hence it simulates being closer to the host.
You still are that far away but since it's sending the packets faster it gets there faster hence it gives you better ms (ping) to the server.

Hope that cleared it up for everyone who is still confused
replies.body_tagged:
lol, you send packets over to whatever you are using (ex: avicus servers), the farther you are the longer it takes, hence bigger ms.
When your cpu sends packets faster it goes through faster hence it simulates being closer to the host.
You still are that far away but since it's sending the packets faster it gets there faster hence it gives you better ms (ping) to the server.

Hope that cleared it up for everyone who is still confused
